batteryProductDescription: Compact yet powerful, the ROYPOW 5.12kWh wall-mounted LiFePO4 battery is designed for off-grid living, rural homes, and solar-powered cabins. Featuring Grade A LFP cells, it offers over 6,000 charge cycles and a 10-year lifespan, while delivering stable, reliable power both day and night, with or without the grid. Backed by 10 years of warranty.
wifiRemoteMonitoring: Support Wi-Fi Remote App Monitoring & OTA Upgrade
batteryFaq1Question: Can off-grid inverter work without battery?
batteryFaq1Answer: Yes, in some cases solar panel and inverter without a battery in this setup, the solar power converts sunlight into electricity, which is then converted by the inverter from DC to AC for immediate use. However, without a battery you can't store excess electricity. This means that after sunlight is insufficient or absent, the system won't provide power, and there will be no electricity at night or during cloudy or rainy days.
batteryFaq2Question: How long do off-grid batteries last?
batteryFaq2Answer: ROYPOW batteries typically last 10+ years with >6,000 charge cycles, providing reliable long-term energy storage.
batteryFaq3Question: How many batteries do I need for off-grid solar?
batteryFaq3Answer: The number depends on your energy consumption. You can connect up to 16 units in parallel for increased capacity.
batteryFaq4Question: What is the best battery for off-grid solar system?
batteryFaq4Answer: LiFePO4 (LFP) batteries are the best choice - they offer superior safety, longer lifespan, and better performance compared to lead-acid batteries.
inverterProductDescription: The ROYPOW 6500W hybrid inverter is ideal for off-grid living and backup power systems. It supports up to 12 units in parallel and delivers 2X rated power for short surges, enabling it to handle heavy loads effectively. With an intelligent control algorithm, automatic generator switching, active cooling, and smart app-based monitoring, it offers reliable and flexible performance for residential solar and off-grid applications.
offGridModeDescription: Works as a traditional off-grid inverter. Supports output settings by utility, battery, or solar PV.
hybridModeDescription: Works as a hybrid. Supports solar and utility sharing the load, with low consumption mode or charge priority mode optional.
inverterFaq1Answer: An off-grid inverter means that it works alone and cannot work with the grid. The off-grid solar inverter stores energy from the battery, transfers it from DC to AC, and powers electrical load equipment and use.
inverterFaq2Question: Can off-grid inverter work without battery?
inverterFaq2Answer: Yes, in some cases solar panel and inverter without a battery in this setup, the solar power converts sunlight into electricity, which is then converted by the inverter from DC to AC for immediate use. However, without a battery you can't store excess electricity.
inverterFaq3Question: What is the difference between hybrid and off-grid inverter?
inverterFaq3Answer: Hybrid inverters can work with both grid and battery systems, while off-grid inverters work independently without grid connection. Hybrid systems provide more flexibility but off-grid systems offer complete energy independence.
inverterFaq4Question: What is the best off-grid inverter?
inverterFaq4Answer: The PowerBase E Series offers excellent performance with support for up to 12 units in parallel, delivering 2X rated power for 10 seconds, IP65 rating, and intelligent monitoring capabilities.

bSolaSTitle: PowerBase B Series - 5.12kWh Wall-Mounted LiFePO4 Battery B-Sola S
bSola11Title: PowerBase B Series - 11.7kWh Wall-Mounted LiFePO4 Battery B-Sola 11
bSola16Title: PowerBase B Series - 16kWh Floor-Mounted LiFePO4 Battery B-Sola 16
bSolaSDescription: Compact yet powerful, the ROYPOW 5.12kWh wall-mounted LiFePO4 battery is designed for off-grid living, rural homes, and solar-powered cabins. Featuring Grade A LFP cells, it offers over 6,000 charge cycles and a 10-year lifespan, while delivering stable, reliable power both day and night, with or without the grid. Backed by 10 years of warranty.
bSola11Description: Ideal for off-grid and backup home energy storage, ROYPOW 11.7kWh wall-mounted battery features Grade A LFP cells for both extended lifespan and stable performance. Thanks to extended lifespan, it ensures long-term reliability. Scalable up to 16 units in parallel, it's perfect for homes requiring flexible, high-capacity backup power that can support essential appliances, HVAC systems, lighting, appliances, and daily life, even during outages.
bSola16Description: ROYPOW 16kWh floor-mounted LiFePO4 battery is an ideal solution for residential energy storage. With its Grade A LFP cell, the battery is engineered to deliver consistent and long-lasting reliable power support. The compact, floor-mounted structure allows for easy installation and seamless integration with solar or grid systems. As an efficient solution for maximizing the power of off-grid living, this battery helps reduce electricity bills and increase energy independence.
Address Support: Support Automatic DIP Switch Address Allocation
exp1Desc1: Develop and maintain front-end interfaces and internal tools using Vite, React, and Shadcn UI, enhancing brand presence and digital efficiency.
exp1Desc2: Collaborate with cross-functional teams on hardware–software integration for IoT and energy system solutions, improving workflow communication and technical performance.
exp2Desc1: Oversaw daily operations and preventive maintenance of university facilities, ensuring compliance with safety and performance standards.
exp2Desc2: Coordinated and supervised maintenance personnel, optimizing task prioritization and resource allocation to meet operational deadlines.
exp3Desc1: Built responsive web applications using React.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and HTML.
exp3Desc2: Applied component-based architecture principles to create scalable and maintainable UIs with integrated APIs and RESTful endpoints.
exp4Desc1: Designed and implemented microcontroller-based IoT systems using Arduino, ESP32, and Raspberry Pi.
exp4Desc2: Integrated sensors, actuators, and wireless communication protocols (Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, MQTT) for real-time automation and monitoring.
proj1Desc: Developed and maintained responsive corporate web applications using React.js, Next.js, and TypeScript. Implemented reusable UI components, modern UX patterns, and performance optimization.
proj2Desc: Developed responsive full-stack web applications with user authentication, verification, and database integration. Applied RESTful API design, MVC architecture, and modern front-end practices.
proj3Desc: Built reinforcement learning models for real-time control of dynamic systems. Applied deep learning, neural networks, and Python-based ML frameworks for predictive modeling and optimization.
